definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Last season was a humiliating homecoming.

sentences.english: Could this mean that I'm comin' home?

sentences.english: With green environmental protection decorates material, give you a healthy sweet home.
sentences.chinese: 以綠色環保型家飾質料，給你一個康健溫馨的故里。

sentences.english: Leave home, people lack of Yiming.
The unrelated temptress, a yearning heart in hometown, hometown.

sentences.english: And even if people return, Mr Sato worries how they will make a living.
sentences.chinese: 即使人們返回故里，Sato也很擔心他們以何爲生。

sentences.english: Gonzalez is back home after being deployed to Iraq three times.
sentences.chinese: Gonzalez被派往伊拉克三次後榮歸故里。

sentences.english: You can also go to Pan ' jiayuan Market. There' re lots of paintings and art there.

sentences.english: Fuyang is the spring and autumn period, the poets hometown of guanzhong statesman of the native place.

sentences.english: Six years later, Jiang smile back to hometown.

sentences.english: Not until the war was over was Einstein able to return to his homeland.

sentences.english: They roved in foreign lands for more than twenty years and returned to their hometown at long last.
sentences.chinese: 他們流落異鄉二十餘載，最後終於返回故里。

sentences.english: Back at home, tears to parting thoughts, full moon, the more concentrated.

definition: illustrious hero, spirit of the place (idiom); a place derives reflected glory from an illustrious son
old site/site of sth (palace, ancient state etc) that no longer exists
to be both a farmer and a scholar/to work the land and also undertake academic studies

the birthplace (of sth good)/the cradle (e.g. of art)
